00060 #define TIMEIT_START(var)                                                   \
00061 {                                                                           \
00062     double _timeit_##var= PIL_check_seconds_timer();                        \
00063     printf("time start (" #var "):  " AT "\n");                             \
00064     fflush(stdout);                                                         \
00065     {                                                                       \
00066 
00067 
00068 #define TIMEIT_VALUE(var) (float)(PIL_check_seconds_timer() - _timeit_##var)
00069 
00070 
00071 #define TIMEIT_END(var)                                                     \
00072     }                                                                       \
00073     printf("time end   (" #var "): %.6f" "  " AT "\n",  TIMEIT_VALUE(var)); \
00074     fflush(stdout);                                                         \
00075 }                                                                           \
00076 
00077 #ifdef __cplusplus
00078 }
00079 #endif
00080 
00081 #endif /* !__PIL_TIME_H__ */
